inn1.comm: on the pads, flicked to fine leg for a single
some bounce now for Shafiul from a length outside off, left alone
tries to plonk a length ball in front of cover and run, but the fielder is on to it quickly
shuffles across but misses a full one on the pads, trickled towards square leg
gets forward and across and pushes a straightening length ball to point
plays this one in front of square and gets across for the single
opens the face and runs down a pacy length ball to third man
angled in fullish on middle and off, he pushes it on the leg side, cannot get the run
pushes this one straight to point from the crease
hitting the defensive bat hard from back of a length and rolling away towards point
nicely bowled, full and headed for the stumps, he crouches and defends tightly
the line has been good throughout the over, this one is just outside off on a length and he gets forward to push to cover
pushed off the back foot towards extra cover
tight pushed single taken on front of cover who has a go at the non-striker's stumps, the backing up isn't good by Nasir and the ball goes to the midwicket boundary
gets away with it, short, wide outside off and he crunches it straight to cover, that should have gone really
gets the line right this time close to off, bit of bounce, left alone
another sharp single taken in front of mid on now
shuffles across and tries to work a back of a length ball away with the angle, gets it to square leg
defended solidly on the off side from the crease
goes for the cut to a skiddy delivery that is not wide enough and is beaten
straightish line a foot outside off with some sharp lift, good leave
can't do anything with this one as well, Rubel keeping things really tight
they are not being able to put even the wide ones away, this one was too far outside off stump but came in a tad even as he went for the cut, and went under his bat
this is a good start for Bangladesh, Shafiul bowls it in with the angle, he gets forward and blocks
coming on around off stump from a length, but he manages to hit it straight back to Shafiul
reaches out to a pitched up one outside off and squeezes it to the left of point, who parries it away
bouncing on to him from short of a length, he brings it down near the wicket, looks for a run but the bowler has already got there
pitched up at 124.1 kph on off stump, he blocks to short extra cover
intent from Simmons now finally, he gets a short ball and goes after it, pulling it over midwicket but the ball stops well inside due to the soggy outfield
tries to shuffle and tuck this one through midwicket, can only push it away on the leg side
gets forward and guides a length ball past point
this is difficult to get away, jagging in on off from back of a length, pushed away towards cover
slower one, but he has played it very well, allows it to come on and dabs it not far from a diving keeper
gets the line back on off, pushed back to him
shuffles across but just plays out a length ball with the angle to mid on
now he leaves the crease but Shafiul shortens the length a bit and he only manages to push in front of mid off for the single, Razzak misses with the throw and they will get another
Simmons is hurried in to the pull and is lucky that the ball did not go to the man at midwicket, drops near the wicket on the leg side
gets this one away, down the track and hits it straight past the non-striker's stumps
eep, now he is trying to make up for all those tight overs by making some room outside leg and going hard at a short ball, misses it totally
better from Simmons, allows this one to come on to the pads and tucks it behind square, they settle for the single in the end
continues to be on middle and off from a skiddy length, he calmly shuffles across and defends
there was width outside off, but he slapped it straight to cover, does not like that
this one will go, width again, bit more bounce, and he places the cut well in front of cover
played off the back foot to cover point
lovely shot, pitched up, simmons gets forward and opens the face to slam the drive through extra cover
well played, does not go hard at the pull as this short one bounces too much, checks the shot to keep it down  in front of square leg
runs a flat and quick one from outside off behind point
flighted now outside off, he gets forward and pushes it past the bowler to long off
nudged behind square leg for one
tossed up ball on the stumps, he squeezes it past Razzak who gets a hand to it, mid on gets around to it
flat one fired in on the pads, he pushes in the air wide of mid on
shortish and he rocks back to slap it through extra cover
flat ball from round the wicket, the batsman tries to slog sweep but misses and gets hit on the pad
beaten again as he charges down the track, Shakib fires it in and he is fortunate he took it on the pads
played with composure, unlike the previous two deliveries, towards deep midwicket
bowled flat and with the angle down leg
pushed off the front foot behind point
tossed up ball driven down to long off
direct hit at the bowler's end, but he has just made his ground as replays show
low full toss pushed along the ground to long on
pushes a tossed up ball straight back to Razzak
good work at slip by Kayes as he gets down on his right to stop a late dab from Barath
pushes this one wide down leg
bowls it quicker and fuller on leg, he wristily works it to midwicket
sliding on in with the angle from a length, he gets bat in front of pad to defend
full one, again on leg, swept behind square
length ball on off stump, he comes forward and defends
gets forward and tucks it in front of midwicket, Shakib runs and turns around to throw at the non-striker's, the batsman was home even as Shakib missed
that could have been close as he tried to defend an angled ball half-forward, it trickled behind but away from the stumps on the off side
whips this one off the back foot in front of square
tossed up ball driven straight to extra cover
worked behind square leg for one
thick edge as he tries to drive one full outside off, rolls away behind point
flight again, he pushes it back to Naeem
another full ball outside off, this time he gets the drive down to long off
guided softly towards point for a single off the front foot
played out with the turn to midwicket
shout for lbw as he misses the sweep and is hit on the pad, was he struck outside the line of off, not given
pushed off the front foot on the off side
Barath gets a boundary this time, gets forward to a pitched up ball and drives it hard to the left of long off who cannot stop it with the dive
tossed up ball defended to short extra cover
cut off the back foot straight to short third man
this time he gets the cut away to sweeper cover
full one on the leg stump whipped in front of square leg
gets half forward, opens the face and dabs this one fine past the keeper, short third man gives chase
played with the turn through square leg
flat delivery nudged from the crease towards square leg
shuffles and tickles this one turning down leg to short fine leg, easily done
pushed back to the bowler
tucked off the pads in front of square leg
appeal for lbw as he bowls it full and quick on the pads, was going down leg as he presses forward
slapped away to sweeper cover for a run
sliding in with the angle, he plays for turn and is hit on the pad
beaten outside off as he tries to cut a ball that was not short at all
quicker one fired in defended off the front foot

runs it to short third man with an open face, direct hit and he was gone, but the throw from short third man missed, Simmons is down on the ground now, looks to have been hit on the knee with that throw
gets down on the knee and sweeps a full ball from middle behind square leg, there is no one in the deep there
tucked towards midwicket for a single
pushed off the front towards point
inside edge as he presses forward and the ball goes just past the stumps fine on the leg side
fifty for Simmons, he was patient against the new balls, tucks this one wide of deep midwicket
that's gone, cranked up, got under a full ball and lofted it over midwicket
length ball slanted in on off, pushed back to the bowler
backs away and flicks off the pads, the man in front of square leg dives and stops it
this one did not get up much outside off, he shuffles across and blocked it
slower one now, he got forward but could only push it towards point
tucks him for room with a back of a length ball close to off, he pushes it late towards point
can't get it this one away as well, has to push towards cover
slung in on to middle and leg, worked with the angle straight to midwicket
gets it away for a single towards mid on
makes room outside leg and gets a boundary, slaps a shortish one past cover
opens up, stands a touch outside leg, but misses as he tries to run a length ball fine on the off side
repeat of the previous delivery, another play and miss outside off as he tries to get it towards third man
pushed away on the off side
flat one turning in on middle and leg, pushed towards midwicket
another one pushed through on middle, punched to short extra cover
backs away outside leg and slaps it against the turn to long off
flat delivery on middle and off pushed back to the bowler
tries to get underneath a fuller one but only manages to hit it along the ground to long on
pushed off the front foot past point
hit to sweeper cover for a single
stays beside the line and runs a length ball to third man
almost carried to short extra cover, who dived to his left and almost got to it, it was pushed in the air off the back foot
backs away outside leg, Shafiul goes full and widish outside off, he cannot connect
gets across but has to dig out a slower one on the off side
opens the face and squeezes a fullish one to third man
worked through square leg off the pad
pushed towards point for another single
gets forward and eases it with the turn to long on
flat and fullish one guided towards point
brings up the 100 with a fine drive off a flighted one through extra cover
played off the back foot to midwicket
length ball outside off, he squeezes the front foot drive past point to third man
guided wide of third man this time, gets him a couple
whoa, that did not get up much even as it was dug in short outside off, left alone
pitched up now and driven to sweeper cover for one
opens the face to a widish one outside off to run it to third man
shuffles but is cramped for room and cannot work this length ball wide of midwicket
turning away quickly from off, dabbed to point from the crease
tossed up ball on middle and off, driven down towards long on, they come back for the second as well
pushed off the front foot with the turn to point
down the track, gets too close to the pitch and squeezes it to long on in the end
too short, too wide, cut straight to point
fuller one pushed back to the bowler
shortish one, slapped to extra cover
eased to cover off the front foot
down the track but he slows it up, shortens it, and Simmons can only push it away
has a charge and a heave, beaten again, and takes it on the pad to escape a possible stumping
gets down and paddles fine wide of long leg
driven off the front foot to covers
short, flat and wide, slapped down to long off
whips a full one off the pads to midwicket, a fumble allows one
a work off the pads towards square leg now
too close for the cut, he takes it off the fourth stump and gets it to point
now this one should have gone, short and wide, he cuts it to backward point
hit to sweeper cover for one
driven in the air down to long off
shuffles across and nudges it off the pad behind square leg
straightening outside off stump, left alone
stays in the crease to a tossed up ball and pushes it on the off side
punched off the back foot past a diving extra cover
walks outside off stump but tentatively pushes off an inside edge on to pad
flat one slapped off the back foot on the off side
mis-hit towards cover
driven off the back foot to cover
played to backward point
punched through covers off the back foot, well timed
short of a length outside off, cut to point
played towards midwicket for a single
tossed up from round the wicket, nudged from the crease to the leg side
played off the back foot towards wide long-on
tries to turn the ball towards square but misses and gets hit on the pad outside  leg stump
rubbish full toss outside off stump, and a nice hittable height, the batsman drives fluently through cover
played off the back foot to sweeper cover
driven from the crease towards long-on
short ball and the batsman heaves off the back foot towards deep midwicket
played off the back foot to cover
the googly on middle and leg, pushed towards square leg
that's down leg side, the batsman tries to sweep and he gets a bit of bat on it
played off the back foot towards the off side
bowled flat on middle stump, hit hard off the back foot to cover
flat-batted off the back foot through cover
bowled flat on off and middle stump, cut off the back foot to deep cover
and this time Simmons goes after it, hitting the bowler through the line, lofting the ball clean over long-on with a full swing of the bat
nudged off the front foot to square leg
pushed off the front foot towards cover
played off the front foot towards mid-on, the fielder from midwicket cuts it off
tossed up on off stump, defended on the front foot
flatter ball on off, cut off the back foot to cover point
Simmons charges and hits the ball off his pads through midwicket
Samuels slaps a slightly shorter ball to deep cover
played to deep square for a single
that's a massive hit over long-on, came forward and hit through the line, far bigger than the previous one
played back to the bowler
played off the pads to deep midwicket
nudged off the back foot towards square
played with an open face towards short third man
the batsman goes back, waits for the ball and whips off his pads through square
he tries to play to short third man but gets an inside edge past the keeper
played uppishly to midwicket, falls just short of the fielder
pushed to long-on for a single
clears his front foot and drives a bit inside out through mid-off
defended on the front foot towards the bowler
Simmons moves forward confidently and forces the ball through midwicket with a mere push, well timed
full and straight, Samuels stays in his crease and drills the ball straight past the bowler with a powerful drive
played off the pads through square, the 100 partnership is up
driven of the pads to long-on for a single that takes him to 99, a maiden ODI century beckons
full toss, Samuels drives to long-on, over to Simmons
the slower ball on off stump, Simmons moves back and across and defends on the leg side
full and straight, Simmons plays it back to the bowler a little tentatively. Some nerves perhaps
driven off the back foot to cover
cut off the back foot to point
dropped, Samuels pushes forward and gets a thin edge that goes between the keeper's legs
there's his hundred, his first in ODIs. He gets there with a gentle push to midwicket. Simmons has got several starts in the past and has now converted one
driven to long off for a single
played to fine leg
stands in the crease and looks to push a pitched up ball towards extra cover, not too much width and he mistimes the shot
sliding stop on the straight boundary from Ashraful, the throw is not collected cleanly at the non-striker;s, and they pick up another run
opens up and pushes this length ball towards cover
driven to long on for a single
gets the boundary now, opens up and squeezes a full delivery through point
another one, slow delivery and width given, he waits for it to arrive and slaps it between cover and point
works it with the angle towards midwicket
fumble at extra cover, and an overthrow allows two where there should have been none
punched off the back foot this time it does not burst through the off side cordon
tight delivery, he pushed it towards cover and took off, had to turn and get back with a dive as the throw came in
pushed back to Shakib
not that short outside off, cut away to point
reaches out and squeezes a full and wide one to point
effective from simmons, shuffles a long way across and hammers a pitched up ball straight past the bowler
nicely done, shortish one sitting up outside off, he waits in the crease and helps it over and wide of short third man
follows him as he makes room outside leg, Simmons drives the full delivery to cover
eep, Shafiul has overdone the angle on this length ball, and sprayed it miles outside leg, no chance for Mush, and the 200 is up

effective again from Simmons, he bends the knee looking for the scoop over short fine leg, but the ball bounced from back of a length, so he adjusted and got enough on it to send it fine on the leg side
another one, Shafiul has conceded four boundaries this over, pitched up outside off, in the slot, he goes down on the knee and slams it through extra cover
played to long off for a single
hit hard over the infield towards deep cover
gets down on one knee and slogs powerfully through midwicket
Samuels makes room and drives inside out through cover point
full ball outside off, played to short third man for a single
that's fired down leg side
driven from the crease towards point

such a tame end to a fine innings. Simmons attempts something which is not his strength, moving across his stumps to try and paddle over short fine leg. There's no pace on the ball whatsoever and it lands in short fine leg's lap
pushed off the front foot through cover point, Darren Bravo's off the mark
full ball on middle stump, Samuels moves his front foot out of the way, gets under the ball and hoists it far over long-on
caught at deep square leg! Samuels tries to hook a short ball but top edges it. Kapali comes running in from the boundary and takes the catch on the move.
another short ball, Bravo ducks under it
short of a length once again, Bravo rides the bounce and plays it down
Pollard tucks the ball off his pads to deep backward square leg
played from the crease toward deep midwicket, it's placed wide of the fielder
driven to long-off for a single, a full toss easily punched
played with soft hands towards short cover, the fielder fails to pick up the ball
played off the pads through square leg
defended on the front foot close on the off side, the fielders are on the edge of the circle
driven off the front foot to long off
defended on the front foot towards cover
and Pollard throws his first punch, smashing the ball over the deep midwicket boundary
defended on the front foot
pushed off the front foot towards cover point, a small mix-up between the batsmen
defended back to the bowler
length ball with plenty of room to swing his arms, Bravo makes space by opening his stance and hammers the ball straight down the ground
full ball outside off, driven to point from the crease
short of a length down leg side, Pollard tries to glance it at first and then tries to let it go, the ball brushes his thigh and carries to the keeper
short ball and Pollard dismisses it with a powerful pull to the deep square leg boundary, Ashraful didn't spot it on the boundary, could have been caught
flicked off the pads to deep square leg
driven down to long on
tries to drive off the front foot but gets beaten by the angle across him
fuller length and straight, Bravo steps forward and lofts the ball right over the bowler's head to the straight boundary. Got under it nicely and timed it well
defended from the crease on the off side
driven to long-off for a single

Close run-out call. The ball was fired down leg side, worked off the pads towards short fine leg for a quick single. The throw comes to the keeper but the batsman is just in. Mushfiqur collected in front of the stumps and had to bring his hands back to break them. Saved by a frame or two.
Bravo tries to slog a leg-stump delivery behind square but doesn't make proper contact
Pollard was aiming for deep midwicket but played the shot too early and bunted it to long-on
full ball and Pollard has got under it and slammed the ball over deep midwicket
this time the shot is deft, he stayed in his crease and opened the face to guide a full ball from outside off past short third man
played to deep square leg, it was the slower short ball and Pollard pulled it
Bravo backs away and plays to cover
that's a high bouncer and Pollard lets it go over his head, he looks around expectantly for the call of wide but it doesn't come
flat ball on middle and leg, worked off the pads to deep square
whipped off the pads once again, to deep midwicket
nudged off the back foot towards midwicket, there's no fielder there so Razzak chases himself
cut off the back foot towards deep point
Pollard moves back, backs away towards leg and hits the ball hard into the gap between long-on and deep midwicket. He hit it flat and all the way for six
driven to long-on for a single
Pollard backs away and swings like he's trying to knock out a man twice his size. A slog it was. It was the slower ball and he gets beaten

Pollard drives the ball hard down the ground to long off but it looks like he's damaged his shoulder during that powerful bat swing. It's his left shoulder and he's in discomfort. The physio comes out to have a look at it

bowled him! Shafiul pitches a slower ball in line with the stumps and angles it across Bravo, who backed away to hit through the off side. He was beaten by the change of pace and the ball clipped off stump
poor ball, full toss on the pads, Hyatt leans across and glances it to the fine leg boundary
played towards backward square leg, it was the yorker and Hyatt had to dig it out, a bit of swing into the right-hander on that one
short ball and Pollard swats it towards deep square leg

caught at long-on! Pollard backs away to a fullish ball and slogs, swinging his bat hard, aiming for a six over deep midwicket. He mis-times it and the fielder at long-on runs to his right to take the catch
short ball and Hyatt hooks behind square
Russell makes room by moving towards leg but the bowler follows him with a yorker, Russell drives to long-on where Shuvogoto Hom picks up smoothly and fires the throw in
a short of a length delivery which is a bit slower, the batsman plays the pull too early and is hit on the body
full ball on off and middle, Russel stays in his crease and lofts the ball right back over the bowler's head
a bouncer to end the over and Russell hooks to deep square leg

inn2.comm: the first ball slants down the leg side, and Tamim gets some pad on it as it slips down the leg side for four leg byes. The crowd roars.
back of a length on middle on off, worked through midwicket for a couple more. Pollard tags it to the boundary and keeps them to two.
well run. Tamim pushes a fuller length ball to mid-off and they charge through for a quickie.
that kept low. Rampaul skids along from short of a length, and Naeem stabs it from the crease even as he crouches quickly to the off side.
play and a miss now. Naeem is stuck on the crease, feeling for it outside off as Rampaul seams it away.
beaten outside off by another beaut. Rampaul seams it away prodigiously, and this one goes at some pace too. Naeem misses it by some distance as he gropes from the crease.
pushes this miles wide of off stump, the keeper does well to get there.
another wide, this time down the leg side. If he averages these two balls and sticks to that line, he'd be unplayable.
that's the line. On a length around off stump, and Tamim plays it solidly down the track.
beautiful shot from Tamim. A touch of width this time, nothing generous, but its enough for Tamim to lean into and send packing through the covers. Imperious.
shortens the length outside off, Tamim shuffles across and shoulders arms.
again, back of a length outside off and Tamim lets it go through.
over-pitched outside off, almost a yorker. Tamim digs it out with an angled face towards point.
slower ball outside off to end the over, Tamim leans out and lets it go.
back of a length outside off, Naeem hangs back and guides to point.
slants this one down the leg side, Naeem is inside the line as he tries to glance and can't get bat on it.
steady away-seamer outside off. Naeem is looking out of place. He hangs in the crease and lashes without conviction outside off. Play and a miss.
gets forward for the first time today, but chooses to shoulder arms as Rampaul moves it away.
another leave outside off, moves away briskly off the seam and Naeem doesn't fiddle with it.
Naeem is staying back too often. Again covers the line and defends from the crease as Rampaul plugs away back of a length.
slightly fuller, Naeem finally gets the front foot into the shot and drives square. Pollard misfields at point, but they can't get the single.
bombastic. Tamim absolutely clatters this length ball over the covers. He doesn't bother with getting all the way across, and just smashes it over the top and the ball blitzes into the cover fence.
back of a length, angling into Tamim who works it to the leg side.
Roach keeps it tight, just outside off on a length that can't be driven. Tamim lets it go.
short of a length at 133 kph, Tamim opens the face and dabs it to third man for one.
a Hitchhiker's moment there for Roach. The towel tucked on the back of his trousers flies out as he delivers. Naeem isn't taken by surprise, but he plays and misses.
Naeem is away, guiding a short ball through point for a single.
back of a length outside off, Naeem stays back and defends to the off side.
fuller length outside off, Naeem punches solidly into the covers.
pacy from Rampaul. Tamim's not getting much strike, and chooses to let this one go outside off.
boy, width is Tamim's oxygen. Fractionally short and wide, and Tamim crunches it backward of point. Third man, Danza Hyatt, does extremely well to dive around, fumble, but still keep it in.
cuts the width this time, Tamim punches off the back foot to the covers.
a half-hearted lash outside off, Tamim doesn't connect for a change.
Naeem threads a steer through point and picks up a fluent couple.

shot of the innings so far, and it comes from Naeem's bat. Back of a length, not too wide, but it comes on beautifully as Naeem stays on the crease and drills on the up through the platoon of fielders manning the covers. Top placement, even better timing.
Roach cramps him this time with a straighter line, and Naeem plays it to the leg side.
over-pitched outside off, Naeem seemed too eager to his the leather off it as he went down on a knee to cover drive, and mishit it into the covers.
pushes him back in the crease this time, and Naeem defends to the off side.
whizzes past the outside edge, Roach puts some shoulder into this one and nearly catches Naeem napping outside off stump.
short and wide from Rampaul, but he gets away with it. The cut is miscued straight to cover.
Rampaul slides this one down the leg side, and it is a wide.
135 kph as Rampaul skids this one back into the batsman. It landed outside leg and was going over the stumps as Tamim was caught on the crease, seemingly beaten by the pace.
Tamim guides fluently into the covers, and a misfield gives him the single.
timing from Naeem once again. Rampaul drifts onto the pads, and Naeem turns the wrists at the opportune moment to send the ball singing away through square leg for a couple.
gets ambitious, looks to blast a short ball outside off out of his presence, and misses.
better from Naeem, gets behind the line and defends a length ball into the off side to end the over.
Tamim looks so good when he's driving square. He's from the Saeed Anwar school of driving, all eyes and wrists. Roach gives him width this time and he laces him to deep point.
back of a length, and closer to off stump. Dealt with defensively.
over-pitched on off stump, Tamim mistimes the drive towards mid-off.
back of a length outside off, Tamim guides it backward of point.
interesting shot. Tamim stays beside the line and works the wrists furiously to guide the ball very late and times it well, but can't beat a very backward point.
again, times the shot really well, but finds the man behind square.
back of a length outside off, Naeem defends from the crease.
fuller length, it was there for the drive, but Naeem wanted to give it some humpty. He doesn't connect.
gets the single this time, opening the face late to steer a shortish ball backward of point.
fuller length outside off, Tamim drives without timing into the covers.
seems to have lost his timing momentarily, Tamim cue-ends the cut into the covers.
full length on middle and off, Tamim focuses on covering the line, and defends down the track.
short and whippy at 126 kph, Naeem dabs it to the leg side.
short of a length outside off, defended from the crease into the off side.
back of a length again and nipping in, Naeem defends to the leg side.
short of a length outside off, Naeem steers through backward point.
Tamim plays all over a length ball on leg stump and misses it. Gets hit on the pad.
good steady over from Russell, Tamim pushes the last ball from the crease towards mid-off for one.
still getting good pace and lift as he bangs this in back of a length. Tamim defends to the off side, on the hop.
fuller and wider outside off, Tamim tries to steer cheekily, but the ball is through him.
on the pads, worked nicely through backward square leg for one.
Naeem feels again outside off with an opened face, and the ball zips through past the outside edge.
Naeem moves into the guided drive through point and gets a single.
I suspect the speed gun isn't working. Tamim seemed to be beaten for pace as he tried to whip a short ball that sped past over the off stump. The speed gun says 116 kph. I say nice try.
bangs this in short of a length, Naeem ducks under the bouncer.
fuller length this time, cut into the covers without timing.
back of a length again, outside off and jumping up, guided from the crease off the handle to the off side.
angled into the pads, Naeem nudges to the leg side and gets a single at long last.
short ball on middle and leg, Tamim pulls gingerly to the leg side.
what a gift. Bishoo strikes with his first ball. It was short, it was wide, and it was barely turning in. Tamim set himself up for a sumptuous cut, and edged it into Ramdin's gloves.
short ball turning into him, and he sweeps it well to deep square leg for a couple.
Bishoo probably thinks the short ball is the way to go after that wicket. Another longhop, cracked to deep midwicket for a single.
on the pads, worked to the leg side from the crease.
better length, turning away as Naeem defends from the crease to the off side.
Naeem gets inside the line now and looks to flick, but can't get the single away.
full ball outside off, worked to the off side.
short and wide, Kayes latches on with a clean backfoot cover drive. The fielder at cover, Pollard, is asleep and the ball goes through for four.
full ball on middle and leg, defended to the leg side.
lands outside leg and turns to hit the pad. Optimistic appeal turned down.
short ball, cuts without timing to point.
again speared down the leg side, and it hits the pad. No chance that is going to be out.
turns away from Naeem who forces it from the crease.
flipper hurries in, Naeem is nearly caught napping as he looks to cut, but keeps it out.
sweeps against the turn, square, this time for a single.
Kayes leans out to defend a full ball outside off.
nicely played, Kayes opens the wrists to guide the drive to the right of the man at covers for couple.
works a length ball to the leg side.
Naeem is stuck on the crease as he defends to the off side.
fuller outside off, defended to the off side off the front foot.
short of a length outside off, if Naeem has a plan, he's not making it clear. Defended from the crease.
short and wide, too tempting even for Naeem and he cracks it into the covers for two.
beats him outside off with a fuller length, Naeem misses the steer.
gets forward and punches into the off side. Finds cover again.

angled in from round the stumps, worked to the leg side. And oh, huge mix-up as Naeem comes back for a non-existent second. Imrul isn't interested, and the throw is to the wrong end, so Naeem scrambles back.
angling into the pads, Naeem defends to the leg side.
up and over, good-looking pick up shot from Naeem but only a single to third man.
poor line. Roach angles down the leg side, and Kayes smartly glances it down to the boundary.
back of a length outside off, Kayes defends to the off side.
fuller length to end the over and Bangladesh have played another dot ball.
Naeem backs away and tries to carve a short ball outside off, and misses. Pressure on, but it is mostly of their own doing.
slower ball outside off, Naeem forces the drive into the covers and a needless throw ricochets off the stumps and allows the overthrow.
full length ball on Kayes' off stump, he defends it into the covers.
sprays this one down the leg side, Kayes can't get bat on it, and it is a wide.
on the pads, nudged through square leg for a single.
out of nowhere, Naeem produces a neat little stroke. Opens the face and slices the length ball backward of point for a rare boundary.
back of a length and cramps him for room now. Naeem defends form the crease.
short of a length and angling into the pads, Naeem nudges to the leg side for one.
Pollard wafts a full toss well wide of off stump, and Kayes gets bat on it to send it flying to third man for four. Horror ball that.
slow offcutter, beats Kayes all ends up as he feels for it from the crease.
fuller length, another dobbler of an offcutter. This time Pollard guides into the covers for one.
another gentle slower ball, Naeem plays it into the cover-point area for one.
Kayes covers the line to another offcutter, and defends.
back of a length from Russell, Naeem is perennially stuck on the crease and can't do much with it.
Naeem backs away and hacks a short ball. No timing, and it dribbles into the covers.
fuller length, more pace. Naeem tries to launch it down the ground, and inside edges onto the pads.
Tamim toe-ends the on-drive to wide mid-on and they pick up a single.
yorker wide of off stump, Naeem tries to steer as he backs away, and ends up too far away.
back of a length outside off, guided through backward point.
short and wide from Polly, Naeem misses the cut.
suddenly Naeem surprises himself with a boundary. Short and friendly from Pollard outside off, Naeem clatters the cut in front of square.
angled in now, Naeem whips to the leg side for a single.
length ball on middle and off, defended from the crease.
fuller on off stump, Kayes covers the line and defends.
fuller ball on off stump, guided into the covers for one.
full ball on middle and leg, driven with the turn to long-on for one.
sweeps a short ball through backward square leg for another single.
mistimes the cut to short third man.
looks to cut again, can't get it away.
works a fuller ball straight to mid on.
flatter and quicker outside off, Kayes misses the cut. Bangladesh are sputtering listlessly here.
full length ball outside off, Naeem drives into the covers for a single.
over-pitched outside off, Tamim drives straight to cover.
angled in from wide of the crease, Naeem works it to the leg side and they scamper a single. Kayes was dawdling away, an accurate throw might have got him.
over-pitched outside off, Kayes drives to long-off for one.
Naeem drags a drive without timing through mid-off for a single.
tossed up on middle, swept backward of square for one.
back of a length on off stump, Kayes defends.
fuller ball, Kayes works to long-on for one.
Naeem pushes meekly from the crease and Samuels fields.
top-edges a sweep with such poor timing that it doesn't carry to the deep. Another single.
wide down the leg side as Kayes misses the tickle to fine leg.
flatter and quicker, Kayes steers nicely but backward point cuts it off.
loopy ball on off and middle, breaking away. Naeem defends to the off side.
shorter ball, forced from the crease into the covers.
works a flighted ball off the pads through square leg. Can't get the gap.
sweeps from outside leg, the top edge runs down to fine leg for one.
flighted outside leg, swept through backward square leg uppishly. 100 at long last.
googly to end the over, Naeem pushes it off the inside half back to the bowler.
length ball on the pads, Kayes nudges backward of square for one.
intent from Naeem, targets midwicket with an audacious jab, but doesn't time it too well. A couple taken as it dribbles into the deep.
over-pitched outside off, Naeem climbs into it with a muscular cover drive, but finds cover.
lashes a back of a length ball outside off with a cross-batted heave, but it is not timed well enough to beat mid-on.
the speed gun is just fooling around with us. 102 kph it says as Kayes advances, gets a bouncer and yanks his head away to stay safe.
short of a length outside off, this time it is the offcutter and Kayes guides it through backward point for two.

whoa, Naeem brings up 50 with a rare burst of adrenaline and timing. Short ball, angling in from outside off, he hops inside the line and picks it up behind square leg with a particularly well timed pull.
back of a length outside off, Naeem dabs a single into the point region.
short of a length outside off, Kayes charges out and swings to the leg side, but can't connect.
fuller length, Kayes opens the face and steers to point.
Kayes joins the fun, he jumps out of the crease, gets to the length and lofts a full length ball between mid-off and cover. Punchy and perky.
holds the length back, Kayes stays beside the line and guides backward of point.
full length outside off, Naeem blasts the cover drive without placement for a single.
short ball, Kayes swivels nicely and guides the pull through backward square leg for four more. Bangladesh have woken up, 25 overs too late. Better late than never.
over-pitched on middle and leg, driven straight to mid-on.
short and wide of off stump, Naeem backs away and gets too far to play a proper shot.

Danza's taken a blinder! Slow offcutter from Naeem, who backs away and swings merrily, but the ball comes on slowly and takes the top edge to fly right up. Hyatt runs back from cover, dives away from the action and takes it with both hands even as he slides along the turf. Supreme stuff.
pacy bouncer to Kayes, he swerves out of the way quickly.
angled in on a length and Ashraful nudges through square leg for one.
short of a length outside off, cut away through point.
length ball outside off, Ashraful runs it off the face through backward point for one.
length ball outside off, guided off the backfoot through backward point.

Ashraful is on his way already. Blink-and-you-miss innings. Nice lively bouncer from Rampaul, Ashraful goes for a shot he wouldn't have tried if it wasn't the Powerplay, or if the situation wasn't so difficult (though, with Ashraful, it is tough to say). He's cramped for the pull and  Ramdin takes the top edge.
back of a length outside off, timed really well by Shakib, who finds cover.
speared in on middle and leg, worked with the turn into the covers.
full ball on middle and leg, worked to the leg side for one more.
Shakib gets another single, nudged off the pads to the leg side.

Kayes' lively hand comes to an end, and it is that man Samuels again. Short ball outside off, it came on faster than he expected and he ended up feathering the cut to the keeper. The Powerplay is doing more bad than good for Bangladesh.
full ball on off stump, leans out to defend.
shorter outside off, defended from the crease into the off side.
short ball outside off, cut away into the covers.
fuller ball to Rahim who leans out ans defends quietly.
sweeps a full ball behind square for a single.
nudges a length ball to the off side for a single.
pre-meditated sweep shot from Rahim, laps it around backward of square for one.
flat and fired in, Shakib plays it back to the bowler.
drives a full ball to long-on for one.
Shakib pushes a length ball down to long off for one more.
single taken to deep midwicket.
tossed up on leg stump, played back to the bowler.
tossed up on middle and leg, turning away, Shakib drives inside out.
Rahim leans out and meets the ball as it spins in. Defended to point.
flat and fast outside off from Bishoo, it is cut straight to point.
full toss on off stump, Shakib smashes it through the covers, and Rampaul pulls off some magic on the rope to keep it inside the ropes. Superb slide and save.
drives to long-on for one more.
width to Rahim who drives inside out to deep cover for two more.
this one stops, turns and bounces extra as Rahim defends from the crease after committing himself on the front foot.
wider outside off, Rahim cuts to the deep for a single.
Rahim cuts Samuels now for another single. Boundaries aren't a coming.
Shakib drives down to long-off for one more.
Rahim produces a six, the first of the innings. Tossed up outside off, he nicely sets himself up and slog-sweeps all the way over midwicket. Meaty blow.
dainty now, gets the bat face facing up, and laps it over short fine leg for a couple. The crowd finds its voice again.
stays in the crease and looks to dab to the leg side.
guides the last ball through point to get a single and keep strike.
short and wide from Bishoo, Rahim cuts it through point for a single.
worked off the pads through the leg side for a single.
more air from Bishoo, Rahim turns it off the pads through square leg for one.
fuller on off stump at 87 kph, Shakib redirects into the covers for one.
Rahim backs away and cuts a single to deep cover.
full ball outside off, driven into the covers for a single.
tossed up outside off, Shakib plays defensively into the covers.
short to Rahim, who cuts to the deep for a single.
Shakib slaps into the covers for a single.
Samuels has taken the Mickey out of the innings. Rahim top-edges the sweep off a flat ball and it nestles in short fine leg's hands. Darren Bravo takes a catch, which is an event by itself.
tossed up outside off, Shakib drives to long-off for one.
Kapali nudges the final ball off his pads, square for a single.
full ball outside off, driven into the covers for a single.
Bishoo cramps Shakib with a flat ball turning in, it is forced into the covers with no timing.,
pushed down the leg side, past the attempted sweep.
loopy ball on off stump, driven to wide long-off for one.
tossed up outside off, driven into the covers for a single.
looped up outside off, Kapali defends.
lap sweep now, worked to short fine leg for two.
tossed up outside off, driven through the covers for a single.
turning in from wide of off stump, dabbed against the turn to backward point.
more air this time, leans out and defends.
Kapali opens the face and steers backward of point.
fuller ball on off stump, defended into the off side.
driven off the back foot to long off for a single.
pulled with power. Short from Bishoo once again, Kapali smashes the covers off it with an aggressive heave.
fuller and better, Kapali nudges into the covers for a single.
Shakib produces four more. Tossed up outside off, swept square this time and the ball nearly carried.
he pushes a single now into the covers.
short of a length outside off, guided to cover for one. All that aggression for 12 runs. The asking rate is 10.5.
flat and fast on middle and off, worked to the leg side for a single.
on the pads now, nudged square for a single.
guided to short third man for a quick single.
short ball outside off, Shakib hacks it past mid-off for a single.
back of a length outside off, worked to the leg side for one.
painfully short ball outside off, cut to deep point for a single.
over-pitched outside off, driven fluently to long-off for a single.
back of a length on off stump, worked to midwicket for a single.
slow offcutter outside off, gently cut away for a single.
offcutter outside off, Kapali drives inside the line and misses.
dinks another slower ball to midwicket with soft hands and they hustle back for a couple. Bangladesh are being penny-wise at the moment. They need pounds in large quantities, though.
Pollard bowls a very wide, wide ball. Floats away out of the playing area.
beats him outside off with another amiable length ball that skims past the edge.
short ball, Shakib bangs the pull away but dead straight to midwicket.
short outside off this time, Shakib's cut is fielded in the deep.
pacy outside off, Kapali slides it off the face to third man for a single.
short again, this time Shakib times it well but again finds the man in the deep.
back of a length outside off, cramped for room as he cuts into the covers.
too short to Shakib, who cuts over the top but still can't beat the boundary rider.

Shakib should try his hand at golf. He's skipped out, got to the length of a ball and drove it through the line, taking the bottom hand off to ensure he didn't pollute the stroke. A thing of beauty, it sailed over long-off.
take that. Shakib shows him muscle this time, jumps out again and blasts it over wide extra cover for four more.
takes the single this time, dabbed sensibly in front of square. Fifty-run stand is up.
Pollard's turn to lose his towel now, Kapali works a length ball through square leg for one.
slanted down the leg side, Shakib helps it along towards fine leg. Big over this.
angles in from wide of the crease, Shakib pushes to the off side to retain strike.
short ball to Shakib, pulled powerfully to deep midwicket.

and that's the end of Kapali. Rampaul excels in these skiddy bouncers that come along faster than you'd imagine. Kapali top-edges a pull and it is easily caught well inside the boundary by a pumped up Simmons.
Shakib pulls another short ball through midwicket for one more.
back of a length on middle and off, worked from the crease to the leg side.
nudged through backward square leg, there were some bonus runs to be had there but the timing wasn't there.
sharp bouncer that buzzes past an out-of-control pull.
back of a length outside off, guided to third man for a single
cut off the back foot in front of point for a single.
bouncer to Nasir, he's aeons late on it as it whizzes past the pull.
full ball on middle and leg, flicked to deep square leg for one.
short ball outside off, Shakib brings up a fighting fifty with a carve into the covers. If only someone else had put their hands up to support him.
top-edges the pull and it lands well short of third man, and they scramble through for two.
full slower ball well outside off, Shakib tries to dig it out but can't get bat on it.
short ball, Shakib pulls it away well, but deep midwicket and wide long-on have it covered.
short ball outside off, again comes on slowly as Shakib cuts to the deep for a single.
well played, Nasir. Hangs back and cuts well between point and deep third man to pick up four.
short of a length outside off, Nasir dabs into the off side for a single.
Shakib backs away and looks for the big scoop over the off side, but can't time it well ehough. Single to deep cover as Rampaul bowls out.
short ball outside off, Shakib forehands and it goes off the outside edge to to third man for one.

huge offcutter. Russell gets it to dart in late and cut Nasir in half as he thinks of cutting, then steering, then defending. He was probably better off working it to the leg side. It ends up going off the bat handle onto the stumps.
pushed wide of off stump, Razzak misses the guide to third man.
Razzak somehow ducks under a ball that wasn't short enough to be a bouncer. It loops over him and the stumps and bounces in front of the keeper.
bouncer now, Razzak periscope pulls to midwicket.
Razzak attempts the big drive into the off side and misses.
slow short offcutter, Shakib miscues the pull to midwicket. The speed gun says 84 kph. Even Shakib bowls faster than that most of the time.
wide of off stump, Razzak toe ends a swipe without timing.
short ball again, Razzak hauls it away to deep third man for one.
cut off the back foot through backward point for a couple more.
low full toss, driven to deep covers for a single.
boundary at long last. Razzak gets some timing away through midwicket for four.

Shakib keeps trying, drives powerfully into the covers. Bishoo tags it valianrly and manages to save the boundary, but the relay thrower wasted his effort by conceding an overthrow for the fourth run. Bishoo seems to have hurt his leg in the process.
Shakib pulls a short ball to deep midwicket for one more.
length from Russell, Razzak hauls it away to deep square leg for one.
Russell bowls a wide as he attempts the bouncer.
worked off the pads to deep square leg for one.
backs away and tries to pull a ball from wide of off stump. No connection made.
same ball, same shot. Another miss outside off stump.
perfect yorker outside off, Shakib digs it out to the off side for a single.
short ball to Razzak, who pulls to the deep for another single.
another pull to the deep for a single. The ball is coming on quite well even now. If only the Bangladesh top-order hadn't sleep-walked for 25 overs ...
full and wide of off stump, Razzak looks to carve through the off side and misses.
gets a single this time, full toss on off, mishit to mid-off.
Shakib cuts the last ball straight to point, and that's the end of that.
